ai-patthana24.1:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana24.1:2.1_0: or cause or reasons not give rise to reason for the sake of causes and reasons.
ai-patthana24.1:2.1_1: or cause or reasons not give rise to reason for the sake of causes.
ai-patthana24.1:3.1_0: Not for the sake of teaching, nor for the sake of a cause,
ai-patthana24.1:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana24.1:6.1_1: when they were born, four, five drops drawn near one another’s wood ...
ai-patthana24.1:6.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
